title: CommunityDJ
detail: An easy way for a crowd to suggest, play, and control the music over a network.
extended_details: Power to the listeners. People on a network will be able to suggest songs and collectively control the music form their own devices. Our platform will be implemented using a raspberry pi and speaker. It will allow members of the network to suggest, skip, and view the songs playing allowing a crowd to control the music rather than just one DJ.

parts_and_costs.part: CanaKit Raspberry Pi 3 Complete Starter Kit - 32 GB Edition.
A portable, Bluetooth, rechargeable battery powered, real speaker
